metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Spring Security versions 5.2.x prior to 5.2.4 and 5.3.x prior to 5.3.2 contain a signature wrapping vulnerability during SAML response validation. When using the spring-security-saml2-service-provider component, a malicious user can carefully modify an otherwise valid SAML response and append an arbitrary assertion that Spring Security will accept as valid.

criterions.comment: libspring-security-2.0-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
